name: Grape Juice Robot
description:
Grape Juice Robot features a boy named Tilson and his best robot friend who has a fatal juice addiction. Unfortunately, Tilson gives his robot friend juice and this causes a deathly malfunction. The robot friend has been disassembled and his parts have been scattered around a realm with slime creatures, goblins, and chickens. Tilson must explore the realm and find his robot friend’s remains to rebuild him. 

Made for the Global Game Jam 2020

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/grape-juice-robot-1
